base_description: Silver faucet set with traditional design.
part_description: Includes two handles and a central spout. Handles are cylindrical with ornate grips, positioned symmetrically on either side of the arched spout.
internal_interaction_description: The handles control water flow to the spout. Turning the handles adjusts the internal valves, regulating hot and cold water mix that flows through the spout.
external_interaction_description: The faucet set is mounted on a sink or countertop. Users interact by turning handles to control water temperature and flow, directing water into a basin for washing or rinsing.
